email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 225m. The starting freight quote is USD 45 per metric ton. The laycan dates are from November 20 to November 25.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's specifications and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan dates?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 225m. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 42 per MT. The laycan dates can be adjusted to November 22 to November 27.

Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. USD 42 per MT is more acceptable. Could you confirm the vessel's availability and provide the final laycan dates? Also, please confirm the demurrage rate.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Liam,

I can confirm the vessel's availability and the final laycan dates are November 22 to November 27. The demurrage rate remains at USD 15,000 per day. If these terms are acceptable, please let us know so we can proceed with the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
